title: What You Need to Know to Keep Yourself, Friends, and Family Safe » Senator Bernie Sanders
description: Over the past couple of weeks, there has been a lot of discussion over the new coronavirus variant, Omicron. The new strain was labeled a "variant of concern" by the World Health Organization, and more information is coming out all the time. As we wait for scientists to give us more information, I want to make sure all Vermonters are aware of the vaccine and testing resources in our state.
